note: 16 actual subdirectories + 'root_engines' (18 files directly in engines/ root, not in any subdirectory)

safety_class.CRITICAL: physics, thermal, vibration, post_processor - direct machine safety impact
safety_class.HIGH: optimization, simulation, quality - computational correctness critical
safety_class.MEDIUM: business, machines, materials, tools - operational but not safety-critical
safety_class.LOW: ai_ml, ai_complete, cad_cam, cad_complete, core, infrastructure - support/enhancement layer

integration_wave.1: CRITICAL safety class - must integrate first with full validation
integration_wave.2: HIGH safety class - integrate with testing
integration_wave.4: LOW safety class - integrate last, enhancement layer

XL.description: 1000+ lines - major effort, may need decomposition

physics.description: Core physics engines: cutting mechanics, kinematics, contact constraints, thermal, and Jacobian solvers. Direct impact on machine safety through force/deflection/thermal calculations.

files.name: PRISM_AI_100_PHYSICS_GENERATOR.js
files.description: AI-driven physics parameter generation for 100% coverage

files.name: PRISM_CONTACT_CONSTRAINT_ENGINE.js
files.description: Contact and constraint physics for tool-workpiece interaction

files.name: PRISM_INVERSE_KINEMATICS_SOLVER.js
files.description: Inverse kinematics solver for multi-axis machines

files.name: PRISM_JACOBIAN_ENGINE.js
files.description: Jacobian matrix computation for kinematic chains

files.name: PRISM_LATHE_PARAM_ENGINE.js
files.description: Comprehensive lathe parameter engine with setup analysis

files.name: PRISM_PHYSICS_ENGINE.js
files.description: Core physics: deflection, force, power, thermal calculations

files.name: PRISM_UNIFIED_CUTTING_ENGINE.js
files.description: Unified cutting parameter calculation with advanced roughing

post_processor.description: G-code generation, validation, and post-processing engines. Safety-critical: incorrect G-code can cause machine crashes, tool breakage, or operator injury.

files.name: POST_PROCESSOR_100_PERCENT.js
files.description: Complete post processor with G-code validator and modal state tracking

files.name: PRISM_GUARANTEED_POST_PROCESSOR.js
files.description: Guaranteed-correct post processor with safety checks

files.name: PRISM_INTERNAL_POST_ENGINE.js
files.description: Internal post engine with user selection and machine-specific output

files.name: PRISM_POST_OPTIMIZER.js
files.description: Post-processing optimization for rapid moves and feed rates

files.name: PRISM_POST_PROCESSOR_DATABASE_V2.js
files.description: Post processor database with G-force physics engine and controller configs

files.name: PRISM_POST_PROCESSOR_GENERATOR.js
files.description: Post processor generator for new machine configurations

vibration.description: Chatter detection and vibration analysis engines. Safety-critical: undetected chatter causes tool breakage and part damage.

files.name: PRISM_CALCULATOR_CHATTER_ENGINE.js
files.description: Stability analysis with critical depth calculation and risk assessment

root_engines.description: Root-level engine files not in subdirectories. Predominantly physics/thermal/vibration engines with direct safety impact. Includes cutting mechanics, thermal modeling, tool life prediction, and signal processing.

files.name: PRISM_CHATTER_PREDICTION_ENGINE.js
files.description: Stability lobe prediction for chatter avoidance

files.name: PRISM_CUTTING_THERMAL_ENGINE.js
files.description: Shear plane temperature, Trigger-Chao model, thermal analysis

files.name: PRISM_PHASE3_ADVANCED_SIGNAL.js
files.description: Discrete wavelet transform and advanced signal processing

files.name: PRISM_SURFACE_FINISH_ENGINE.js
files.description: Surface finish calculation per ISO 1302 / ASME Y14.36

files.name: PRISM_THERMAL_EXPANSION_ENGINE.js
files.description: Linear/volumetric thermal expansion per Bryan Principles

files.name: PRISM_VIBRATION_ANALYSIS_ENGINE.js
files.description: Vibration analysis per MIT 16.07 and Altintas models

files.name: SPEED_FEED_UI.js
files.description: Speed/feed calculator UI with history and overrides

optimization.description: Mathematical optimization engines: combinatorial, multi-objective, constrained/unconstrained, swarm intelligence, trust region, and interior point methods. Computational correctness directly affects machining parameters.

files.name: PRISM_ACO_SEQUENCER.js
files.description: Ant Colony Optimization for operation sequencing

files.name: PRISM_ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATION_ENGINE.js
files.description: Advanced optimization with multiple solver strategies

files.name: PRISM_ADVANCED_UNCONSTRAINED_OPTIMIZER.js
files.description: Unconstrained optimization: conjugate gradient, L-BFGS, Newton methods

files.name: PRISM_COMBINATORIAL_OPTIMIZER.js
files.description: Branch & Bound, cutting planes, dynamic programming per MIT 15.083J

files.name: PRISM_INTERIOR_POINT_ENGINE.js
files.description: Interior point method for linear/quadratic programming

files.name: PRISM_MONTE_CARLO_ENGINE.js
files.description: Monte Carlo simulation for uncertainty quantification

files.name: PRISM_RAPID_PATH_OPTIMIZER.js
files.description: Rapid path optimization for non-cutting moves

files.name: PRISM_SQP_INTERIOR_POINT_ENGINE.js
files.description: SQP and interior point for constrained optimization per MIT 6.251J

simulation.description: Collision detection, motion simulation, 3D visualization, and stock verification. High safety class: undetected collisions can damage machines.

files.name: PRISM_COLLISION_ENGINE.js
files.description: Core collision detection with AABB and tool bounding boxes

files.name: PRISM_COLLISION_MOTION.js
files.description: GJK algorithm, EPA, motion planning collision analysis

quality.description: Quality management: inspection, SPC, non-conformance tracking, corrective actions. High importance for manufacturing compliance.

files.name: PRISM_QUALITY_MANAGER.js
files.description: Quality manager with SPC, NCR, CAR tracking per ISO standards

business.description: Business operations: job scheduling, costing, quoting, financials, inventory, order management, subscriptions. Operational importance but not safety-critical.

files.name: PRISM_JOB_COSTING_ENGINE.js
files.description: Job costing with material, labor, and overhead

files.name: PRISM_JOB_SHOP_SCHEDULING_ENGINE.js
files.description: Job shop scheduling with dispatching rules per MIT 15.053

files.name: PRISM_QUOTING_ENGINE.js
files.description: Quoting with margin targets, rush/prototype pricing, volume discounts

machines.description: Machine-specific engines: 3D system visualization, rigidity calculations, machine simulation. Medium safety - provides machine context data.

files.name: PRISM_MACHINE_3D_SYSTEM.js
files.description: Machine 3D visualization and model management system

materials.description: Material property simulation and REST API for material data. Supports material removal simulation and property lookup.

files.name: PRISM_MATERIAL_SIMULATION_ENGINE.js
files.description: Material removal simulation with dexel model and collision detection

files.name: PRISM_REST_MATERIAL_ENGINE.js
files.description: REST API for material property access

tools.description: Tool management: 3D tool/holder generation, performance data, library management, lathe parameters, nose radius compensation.

files.name: PRISM_LATHE_PARAM_ENGINE.js
files.description: Comprehensive lathe parameter analysis and recommendations

files.name: PRISM_TOOL_3D_GENERATOR.js
files.description: 3D tool model generation for all tool types

files.name: PRISM_TOOL_PERFORMANCE_ENGINE.js
files.description: Tool performance data: coatings, materials, speed factors

ai_ml.description: Machine learning and AI engines: neural networks, decision trees, reinforcement learning, genetic algorithms, PSO, Bayesian methods, NLP, OCR, clustering, deep learning. Enhancement layer that improves recommendations but not safety-critical.

files.name: PRISM_ADVANCED_DQN.js
files.description: Deep Q-Network with extensions for RL

files.name: PRISM_AIRCUT_ELIMINATION_ENGINE.js
files.description: Air cut detection and elimination using AI

files.name: PRISM_AI_INTEGRATED_SYSTEM.js
files.description: AI integration hub for subsystem coordination

files.name: PRISM_COMPLEX_CAD_LEARNING_ENGINE.js
files.description: Learning from complex CAD feature patterns

files.name: PRISM_DECISION_TREE_ENGINE.js
files.description: Decision trees for classification and manufacturing decisions

files.name: PRISM_FUSION_SKETCH_CONSTRAINT_ENGINE.js
files.description: Fusion-style sketch constraint solving with ML

files.name: PRISM_INTELLIGENT_DECISION_ENGINE.js
files.description: Intelligent decision engine with multiple ML models

files.name: PRISM_LEAN_SIX_SIGMA_KAIZEN.js
files.description: Lean Six Sigma and Kaizen methodology engine

files.name: PRISM_ML.js
files.description: Core ML framework: neural network layers, activations, training

files.name: PRISM_NEURAL_NETWORK.js
files.description: Neural network foundation with Sequential model

files.name: PRISM_REGULARIZATION_ENGINE.js
files.description: Comprehensive regularization: dropout, L1/L2, batch norm, weight decay

ai_complete.description: Complete AI/ML algorithm implementations: reinforcement learning, attention mechanisms, time series, clustering, GNN, hyperparameter optimization, online learning, XAI. Academic-sourced (Stanford, MIT).

files.name: PRISM_ATTENTION_COMPLETE.js
files.description: Scaled dot-product and multi-head attention per Vaswani et al.

files.name: PRISM_RL_COMPLETE.js
files.description: Reinforcement learning complete: Q-learning, SARSA, policy gradient

files.name: PRISM_TIME_SERIES_COMPLETE.js
files.description: Time series: exponential smoothing, ARIMA, forecasting

cad_cam.description: CAD/CAM engines: BREP, NURBS, BVH, sketch, topology, mesh, toolpath generation, surface reconstruction, feature recognition, collision, voxel stock. Large and diverse subsystem.

files.name: PRISM_BREP_CAD_GENERATOR_V2.js
files.description: B-Rep CAD geometry generator with topology

files.name: PRISM_BVH_ENGINE.js
files.description: Bounding Volume Hierarchy for collision detection

files.name: PRISM_CAD_QUALITY_ASSURANCE_ENGINE.js
files.description: CAD model quality assurance and validation

files.name: PRISM_REST_MACHINING_ENGINE.js
files.description: Rest machining and remaining material detection

files.name: PRISM_SKETCH_ENGINE.js
files.description: 2D sketch engine with planes and constraints

cad_complete.description: Complete CAD/CAM subsystem implementations: full CAD generation, feature recognition, feature-to-strategy mapping. Consolidated modules.

files.name: PRISM_COMPLETE_CAD_GENERATION_ENGINE.js
files.description: Complete CAD generation with math, geometry, BREP, and thread support

core.description: Core orchestration and utility engines: enhanced orchestration, failsafe generation, interval arithmetic, numerical engine, unified output.

files.name: PRISM_ENHANCED_ORCHESTRATION_ENGINE.js
files.description: Enhanced orchestration with 68 machine models and 7 post processors

files.name: PRISM_FAILSAFE_GENERATOR.js
files.description: Failsafe parameter generation for error recovery

files.name: PRISM_INTERVAL_ENGINE.js
files.description: Interval arithmetic for guaranteed numerical bounds

infrastructure.description: Infrastructure engines: database management and event management. Foundational services for the engine ecosystem.

files.name: PRISM_DB_MANAGER.js
files.description: Central database registry and management with layer-based access control

files.name: PRISM_EVENT_MANAGER.js
files.description: Event listener management with automatic tracking and delegation

cross_references.note: Many engines reference each other. Key dependency chains identified during sampling:

recommendations.wave_1_priority: Start with physics/thermal/vibration/post_processor - these are the safety backbone. Total: 41 files (9 physics + 12 post_processor + 2 vibration + 18 root-level CRITICAL).
recommendations.wave_2_priority: Optimization (25) + simulation (7) + quality (3) = 35 files. High computational correctness requirements.
recommendations.wave_3_priority: Business (11) + machines (4) + materials (2) + tools (9) = 26 files. Operational but not safety-critical.
recommendations.wave_4_priority: AI/ML (74) + ai_complete (13) + cad_cam (55) + cad_complete (4) + core (5) + infrastructure (2) = 153 files. Enhancement layer.
xl_files_needing_decomposition: PRISM_REGULARIZATION_ENGINE.js (12,613 lines) - needs splitting into sub-modules
PRISM_BVH_ENGINE.js (6,562 lines) - large but cohesive spatial data structure
PRISM_AIRCUT_ELIMINATION_ENGINE.js (5,228 lines) - AI detection + elimination could split
PRISM_GEODESIC_DISTANCE_ENGINE.js (4,050 lines) - algorithmic, may stay monolithic
PRISM_COMBINATORIAL_OPTIMIZER.js (3,938 lines) - multiple algorithms, could split by type
PRISM_DECISION_TREE_ENGINE.js (3,172 lines) - ML trees, moderate complexity
PRISM_PHYSICS_ENGINE.js (2,974 lines) - core physics, could split: deflection/force/thermal
PRISM_COMPLETE_CAD_GENERATION_ENGINE.js (2,914 lines) - CAD gen with math+geometry
